attributes.action: IF YOU HAVE SIGNED AN E-PETITION REGARDING ATOS CARRYING OUT MEDICALS FOR THE DWP THEN PLEASE JOIN FORCES AND SIGN THIS ONE.THIS E-PETITION IS TO HAVE
attributes.additional_details: I SUFFER MENTAL HEALTH PROBLEMS AND I HAVE BEEN PUT THROUGH THE TRAUMA OF BEING EXAMINED BY ATOS THEN BEING KICKED OFF ESA THEN LOSING MY APPEAL THEN WINNING A TRIBUNAL(IT TOOK THEM 2 MINS TO OVERTURN DWP DECISIONS)IF YOU HAVE SIGNED A SIMILAR PETITION TO THIS THEN LETS JOIN FORCES SO WE GET THE AMMOUNT OF SIGNITURES WE NEED.I WANT OUR OWN GP'S TO CARRY OUT THE MEDICAL EXAMINATIONS AND THE DECISIONS ON WETHER WE ARE FIT FOR WORK.THANK YOU.M.CASWELL
